short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Streams to make phone calls from the Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Streams Communications Extension to make phone calls from the Chrome browser. 

Click to Call feature allows users to make a phone call by clicking any phone number (10 digits or more) on a web page. Multi-factor authentication for the extension provides enhanced security.
